website

This website was designed to show the interconnectedness of my work.

It has a subtle warm off-white background color "#FFFFF2."

It was built in Eleventy, a static site generator.

More to come ...

Thanks to Reuben Son, Jungsuh Rhee, Megan Pai, Jack Rieger, Peter Pelberg, Min Guhong, and AV for guidance. And to Gradient Retreat, a beautiful place on an island, where this website began, Summer 2023.
